vcrs.title: Redgate's 2019 State of Database DevOps Report
vcrs.shortSummary: Read the new Report for the latest insights into DevOps adoption among SQL Server professionals.
vcrs.campaign: Redgate

vcrs.title: Reference Methodology for Agility, Version-0.5
vcrs.shortSummary: This white paper outlines a meta-process for organizations to refer and become integration agile.
vcrs.campaign: WSO2 - Reference Methodology for Agility, Version-0.5

vcrs.title: Lyft’s Move to Microservices: A Case Study
vcrs.shortSummary: It’s a challenge to quickly and accurately monitor Lyft’s system as the number of microservices grows, because a distributed architecture generates exponentially more data than its monolithic predecessor. To address this challenge, Lyft chose to implement [x]PM. Learn why.
vcrs.campaign: LightStep - Lyft’s Move to Microservices: A Case Study

vcrs.title: The Only Good Reason to Adopt Microservices
vcrs.shortSummary: Using microservices is absolutely the right way to scale your engineering organization because you‘re going to ship your org chart, no matter what. Learn More.
vcrs.campaign: LightStep - The Only Good Reason to Adopt Microservices

vcrs.title: Application Performance Management in a Containerized World
vcrs.shortSummary: Is Traditional APM Failing Your Containerized Applications? Explore the world of containers & their impact application performance and monitoring.
vcrs.campaign: Instana - Application Performance Management in a Containerized World

vcrs.title: Manual Monitoring Bad! Automatic Monitoring Good!
vcrs.shortSummary: In the race to keep software delivery up to pace with user expectations, manual monitoring puts all that at risk. The more your applications change, the more you must automate.
vcrs.campaign: Instana - Manual Monitoring Bad! Automatic Monitoring Good!

vcrs.title: The Ultimate Application Monitoring Guide for Kubernetes
vcrs.shortSummary: Kubernetes was supposed to address the application resource nightmare, but it hasn’t worked out that way.  There's  a way to effectively manage the performance of orchestrated, containerized applications but a whole new monitoring attitude is required, and it begins with complete automation.
vcrs.campaign: Instana - The Ultimate Application Monitoring Guide for Kubernetes

vcrs.title: Microservices Broke APM: Why we Need a New Scorecard for Observability
vcrs.shortSummary: Metrics, logs, and traces, taken on their own,  do not constitute a coherent approach to observability.  This guide presents an alternative, value-driven approach to independently measuring and grading an observability practice – a new scorecard for observability.
vcrs.campaign: LightStep - Microservices Broke APM: Why we Need a New Scorecard for Observability/(7.19)Putting Services First - A New Scorecard for Observability

vcrs.title: Obtain a holistic view of your application behaviour and troubleshoot errors with Site24x7
vcrs.shortSummary: View the following key metrics for any dependent resource: response time, throughput, status of connection, and failed request count. Identify any abnormalities—like increases in response time or throughput—at a single glance and inspect them without delay.
vcrs.campaign: Site24x7 - Obtain a holistic view of your application behaviour and troubleshoot errors with Site24x7

vcrs.title: Monitor the time taken by DB queries and external calls. Identify slow queries and eliminate them.
vcrs.shortSummary: Get detailed performance metrics to identify slow database calls, database usage and overall performance of the database furnished with detailed graphical and tabular representations.
vcrs.campaign: Site24x7 - Monitor the time taken by DB queries and external calls. Identify slow queries and eliminate them.

vcrs.title: Monitor your applications built in Java, .NET , Ruby, PHP and Node.js
vcrs.shortSummary: Get unmatched visibility into the way web applications behave. Visualize web transactions from end to end, with performance metrics of all components starting from URLs to SQL queries allowing you to identify and resolve performance degradation no matter where they originate.
vcrs.campaign: Site24x7 - Monitor your applications built in Java, .NET , Ruby, PHP and Node.js

vcrs.title: Hybrid API Management: Run Your API Gateways Anywhere
vcrs.shortSummary: API management is moving towards hybrid approaches, where some parts of the platform are cloud-based and the rest is based on on-premises data centers. This paper intends to explain why and when you would need a hybrid API management solution.
vcrs.campaign: WSO2 - Hybrid API Management: Run Your API Gateways Anywhere

vcrs.title: The Case for Open Source Identity and Access Management
vcrs.shortSummary: This white paper discusses the benefits of adopting an open source IAM solution, how to choose the right open source IAM solution, and how WSO2 Identity Server helps to build a new IAM solution or migrate from an existing proprietary solution.
vcrs.campaign: WSO2 - The Case for Open Source Identity and Access Management

vcrs.title: Microservices with Redis Enterprise on Kubernetes
vcrs.shortSummary: Microservices are a great way for organizations to modernize application architecture. Technologies such as containers and Kubernetes are emerging to facilitate the adoption and management of microservices. Learn why Redis Enterprise is uniquely suited to a microservices application environment.
vcrs.campaign: RedisLabs - Microservices with Redis Enterprise on Kubernetes

vcrs.title: Mobile Testing for the Enterprise: Why You Need an Industrial USB Hub
vcrs.shortSummary: This guide provides you with everything you need to know about USB hubs, presented in a simple, yet strategic, way. It’s your one-stop-shop to understanding how mobile devices work with USB hubs – and will help you stay informed and educated on this topic.
vcrs.campaign: Cambrionix - Mobile Testing for the Enterprise: Why You Need an Industrial USB Hub

vcrs.title: Advanced Linux Commands
vcrs.shortSummary: In this cheat sheet, author Maxim Burgerhout, uses the development of a LAMP application as an example and provides commands to: Get started developing a web application on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7,  set up a SELinux boolean, run a program in the background in your shell,, use Java instead of PHP.
vcrs.campaign: Red Hat - Advanced Linux Commands/(7.2)One-click Java Spring PetClinic Web App on Openshift

vcrs.title: Download Openshift 4 for AWS, for Free
vcrs.shortSummary: Red Hat OpenShift offers automated installation, upgrades, and lifecycle management throughout the container stack—the operating system, Kubernetes and cluster services, and applications—on any cloud. Manage with simplicity. In the cloud or anywhere.
vcrs.campaign: Red Hat - Download Openshift 4 for AWS, for Free

vcrs.title: Become a Kubernetes Master – Download the Cheat Sheet
vcrs.shortSummary: Kubernetes is an open-source platform for automating deployment, scaling and operations of application containers across clusters of hosts.  Download this Kubernetes cheat sheet to learn how to install Minikube, run locally on Minikube, install Kubectl, and use the Kubectl CLI.
vcrs.campaign: Red Hat - Become a Kubernetes Master – Download the Cheat Sheet

vcrs.title: Application Performance Monitoring (APM) using the InfluxDB Time Series Platform
vcrs.shortSummary: The paper discusses APM value propositions, functionalities and implementation methods. It also discusses the benefits of performing APM using open source technologies, and in specific, how to perform APM using InfluxDB open source time series platform. Register to download this paper.
vcrs.campaign: InfluxData - Application Performance Monitoring (APM) using the InfluxDB Time Series Platform

vcrs.title: TEST Making the Shift from Relational to NoSQL
vcrs.shortSummary: Companies like AT&T, GE, and PayPal have successfully transitioned from relational to NoSQL for their critical web, mobile, and IoT applications. By understanding where to introduce NoSQL, how to model and access the data, and how to manage and monitor a distributed database, you can do the same.
vcrs.campaign: TEST - Couchbase - Making the Shift from Relational to NoSQL

vcrs.title: Java InfoQ Trends Report - July 2019
vcrs.shortSummary: The report provides an overview of technology adoption and commentary on how we see the Java and JVM-related space evolving in 2019. Key developments include the release of Java 13, the rise of non-HotSpot JVMs and the evolution of GraalVM, and the changing landscape of Java microservice frameworks.
vcrs.campaign: InfoQ - Java InfoQ Trends Report - July 2019

vcrs.title: Machine Learning for Developers: 5 Essential Podcasts
vcrs.shortSummary: We talked to several luminaries in the artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) space,  including Grady Booch, Emmanuel Ameisen, Megan Cartwright,  and others.  Explore how some of the most innovative companies are building, training, and deploying AI/ML systems in production.
vcrs.campaign: InfoQ - Machine Learning for Developers: 5 Essential Podcasts

vcrs.title: 5 Essential Software Architecture Podcasts to Listen to in 2019
vcrs.shortSummary: We talked to several luminaries in the artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) space,  including Grady Booch, Emmanuel Ameisen, Megan Cartwright,  and others.  Explore how some of the most innovative companies are building, training, and deploying AI/ML systems in production.
vcrs.campaign: InfoQ - 5 Essential Software Architecture Podcasts to Listen to in 2019

vcrs.title: IoT Architecture - Choosing the Right IoT Data Platform
vcrs.shortSummary: This paper reviews how an IoT Data platform fits in with any IoT Architecture to manage the data requirements of every IoT implementation. It is based on the learnings from existing IoT practitioners that have adopted an IoT Data platform using InfluxData.
vcrs.campaign: InfluxData - IoT Architecture - Choosing the Right IoT Data Platform

vcrs.title: How to Reduce Your Logging Bill by 90%
vcrs.shortSummary: Learn how to massively reduce your logging bill and MTTR, embed application logs in traces at no cost, and more effectively surface the root cause in a complex system. Download the technical white paper to learn more.
vcrs.campaign: LightStep - How to Reduce Your Logging Bill by 90%

vcrs.title: OpenShift Guide for Developers (By O’Reilly)
vcrs.shortSummary: Learn how to use a virtual machine with OpenShift installed and configured on your local environment, create and deploy your first application on the OpenShift platform, and more. Download the O'Reilly eBook.
vcrs.campaign: Red Hat - OpenShift Guide for Developers (By O’Reilly)
